headline: Does Bank of America’s Local Sports Push and Crypto Access Strategy Reshape Its Brand Narrative (BAC)?
summary: Earlier this month, the Portland Timbers announced Bank of America as their new front-of-jersey partner in a multi-year, community-focused deal that will fund free youth camps, equipment donations and the creation or resurfacing of 10 “Community Futsal Courts” across Oregon and Southwest Washington. By pairing a high-visibility MLS jersey sponsorship with its Soccer with Us program, Bank of America is using sports partnerships to highlight its broader push into community impact, financial...
